pages.text: $(4)Provides full lava immunity when paired with the Netherite Diving Helmet and a full set of Netherite Armor. Ensure it is filled with pressurized air.$() $(br2)Provides pressurized air durability for the Potato Cannon and Extendo Grip.
To replenish air, provide stress to the shaft on the top when it is placed.$(br2)Can be enchanted with Capacity to increase air capacity.
